com.janrain.android.engage.utils.Archiver Class Reference

List of all members.

static boolean loadBooleanWithDefault (String name, boolean defaultValue)

Detailed Description

Utility class used to archiveDictionary/unarchive objects. This implementation serializes the object to a binary format and saves to the protected storage area (disk).

Member Function Documentation

static boolean com.janrain.android.engage.utils.Archiver.save ( String  name,
Object  object 
) [static]

Saves (archives) the specified object to the local (protected) file system.

Parameters:
name The name the object will be saved as on disk. This parameter cannot be null.
object The object to be saved.
Returns:
Returns true if the save operation is successful, false otherwise.
Exceptions:
IllegalArgumentException if the context or name parameters are null.
static Object com.janrain.android.engage.utils.Archiver.load ( String  name  )  [static]

Loads (unarchives) the specified object from the local (protected) file system.

Parameters:
name The name of the object to be loaded from disk. This parameter cannot be null.
Returns:
The object if found and loaded, null otherwise.
Exceptions:
IllegalArgumentException if the context or name parameters are null.

Returns:

Loads (unarchives) the specified boolean object from the local (protected) file system.

static boolean com.janrain.android.engage.utils.Archiver.loadBooleanWithDefault ( String  name,
boolean  defaultValue 
) [static]

Loads (unarchives) the specified boolean value from the local (protected) file system. If the value cannot be found (null), the default value will be returned.

Parameters:
name The name of the boolean to be loaded from disk. This parameter cannot be null.
defaultValue The default boolean value to be returned if the lookup fails.
Returns:
The boolean if found and loaded, null otherwise.
Exceptions:
IllegalArgumentException if the context or name parameters are null.
